snippet: The hotelier’s newest property opens in the landmark Metropolitan Life Tower on Madison Avenue on May 11.
abstract: Travel Q&A with hotelier Ian Schrager, whose latest project New York Edition, collaboration with Marriott International, is set to open in Manhattan's landmark Metropolitan Life Tower.
lead_paragraph: The hotelier’s newest property opens in the landmark Metropolitan Life Tower on Madison Avenue on May 11.

headline.print_headline: Ian Schrager on Hotels and ‘Pulling Rabbits Out of a Hat.’
headline.main: Ian Schrager Unveils the New York Edition
